channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large amount of litter, 9th February
item.description:
A really horrible amount of litter has gathered on the curve of this road as you turn onto the motorway - please could it be cleaned up, thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A seat and some bin bags dumped, 9th February
item.description:
Hard to tell if this is the right curve in the road, but someone has dumped a red velvet seat and some bin bags here
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Grange Salterley Grange, Leckhampton Hill
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Queens Road - railway station brick boundary wall, 9th February
item.description:
Multiple pieces of graffiti, on outer face of station boundary wall, facing onto Queens Road. Full length of wall, from the station car park exit along past the new-ish steps, through to the corner where wall was rebuilt last year. ALL graffiti on the Queens Road side of the wall needs cleaning off. Not a great advert for Cheltenham as people leave the station.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 77 Queen's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole on the carriageways, 9th February
item.description:
There is a large and deep pothole on the carriageway past the turning for Star Centre towards Crickley Hill
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Greenway Lane, Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stree lighting not working, 8th February
item.description:
The street light never worked from day one
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Olivine Crescent, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown and broken fences, 8th February
item.description:
This area of pathway leading onto the railway bridge requires maintenance to both the fence and foliage. The pathway is restricted to single file and dangerous as pedestrian passing requires stepping into the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Pagets Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement, 8th February
item.description:
Pavement covered with soil, leaves and brambles. This has been reported previously. I’ve since received an email say it has been dealt with. It obviously has not. Any cursory inspection of the “verge” beside the road will show where it has been partially cleared.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Surface deteriorated around Manhole on Kipling Road, 8th February
item.description:
Can somebody please inspect it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 59 Kipling Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road is slippery with oil or diesel, 7th February
item.description:
Numerous complains that this section of road (opposite David Lloyd Gym) is slippery with numerous cars skidding and facing opposite direction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Stadco Takao Europe Ltd Delta Way, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 7th February
item.description:
Both roadside verges of Hyde Lane from its junction with Church Road to the Cheltenham boundary at Hyde Brook are heavily littered and have not had a litter pick since 2021. This is a primary route for traffic during Gold Cup Week. As it stands an appalling advertisement for Cheltenham.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hyde Lane, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: We believe these ash trees,over hangingthe highway,are dead.,and potentially dangerous, 7th February
item.description:
Dead trees overhanging highway

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Church Farm The Green, Elmstone Hardwicke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge white caravan parked on road for weeks with no MOT, 7th February
item.description:
HX05 URF is the number plate of the white motor home. It is against the covernance of the houses and local splay. This is opposite 64 Guan Road. In addition there is a work van parked at 10 Natilus Close which is also against the covernance and reduces the visual splay of the area. Due to the addition of work vans at this property the other people who frequent this property park on the grass which is turning muddy and looks awful.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 61 Guan Road, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Years of litter down the back of a street box on Evington Road outside Franklin Court, 6th February
item.description:
Can somebody come and tidy it up please it’s a complete eyesore. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 62-66 Edinburgh Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Iceland superstore trolley at benhall Gardens, 6th February
item.description:
These trolleys belong to the Iceland superstore on Tewkesbury Road. They are a long way from home, can somebody pick them up please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Wasley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two Deep Potholes on single track Road, 6th February
item.description:
The locaion is the Cleeve Common Road just further than the footpath shown on the map. These two potholes were previously filled but have opened back up again. They are quite deep and sharp edged and it is difficult to avoid them on this single track road. As other potholes have been marked on this road for filling - can these two be added to the list.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Whittington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped Waste, 6th February
item.description:
The location is the Cleeve Common Road in the trees opposite the Bill Smiley Reserve and also opposite a WASTE BIN! Rubbish has been thrown here. Please can it be cleared up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Whittington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previous repairs come away on Libertus Road, 6th February
item.description:
The hole is probably 7 1/2 cm deep. Can somebody come and inspect it? Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 30 Libertus Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: As soon as it’s windy the multi packs are back on catkin Drive, 6th February
item.description:
I think the neighbourhood team need to speak to the shops, this is totally unacceptable. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Rowanfield Exchange Devon Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Small fridge outside 16 to 24 Somerset Road, 6th February
item.description:
Can someone pick it up please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Clevedon Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish at Location, 6th February
item.description:
The location is the entrance to the old quarry on the Cleeve Common Road. More rubbish has been thrown here. Please can it be cleared up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
